about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY

Use the 4 avocado pieces and their unique sliding mechanics to plant all of the seeds into the soil and water tiles. Order of operations is key, and using the pieces in clever ways is often the only way to solve the puzzle. Some seemingly easy levels will have you completely stumped until you get a very satisfying 'Aha!' moment where you see the solution.

EXPERIENCE

After a short collection of tutorial levels, the game loads you immediately into an endless landscape of procedurally-generated puzzles that flow beautifully into each other upon solving. As you complete levels you will unlock three additional difficulty tiers that offer much more challenging puzzles.

UI

The minimalistic UI distracts only with the essentials:
the oft-needed reset and undo buttons, a convenient settings menu, and a puzzle-sharing button that lets you send level-codes to a friend.

Immerse yourself in fullscreen mode or keep the game open in a small window to visit throughout your day when you need a relaxing break.

We hope this game offers peaceful little moments when you need them most.
Happy puzzling :)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Duplicado

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“I am absolutely delighted with Duplicado. I can’t think of a little game that is more beautifully rendered, more endearing or more replayable than this. Such a simple concept, but the developers have polished it to the point that it feels like a high-end game.”
Two Thumbs Up! – LadiesGamers
short_description: Duplicado is a soothing yet challenging puzzle game with unique avocado-themed mechanics. Journey across a serene avocado orchard, planting trees as you slide and solve your way through a nearly endless number of satisfying puzzles.
